data.name: Rampaging Stomp
data.tooltip:
Stomp the ground, dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateStomp_DamageRadius.amount" style="Bold"/> damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateStomp_Stun.duration"/> seconds.

Further distant enemies are slowed by <d ref="(-1) * StunningStomp_BuffSlow.modifiers[0].amount"/>% instead.
